name: vonage-voice-teneo
description: A Teneo bot connector for Vonage Voice.

WEBHOOK_FOR_VONAGE.description: Webhook for Vonage Voice i.e. the server it will send messages to i.e. external address for server this application runs on

PATH_TO_ANSWER.description: Gets appended to the above webhook - creates the endpoint to send messages to in the application.  Defaults to /webhooks/answer

PORT.description: Port this runs on.  Defaults to 1337

TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Please input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

LANGUAGE_ASR.description: Please enter your Vonage Language for voice recognition (ASR).  Defaults to 'en-GB'.  List is here: https://developer.nexmo.com/voice/voice-api/guides/asr#language

VOICENAME.description: Please enter your Vonage Language for spoken voice (TTS).  Defaults to 'Amy'.  List here: https://developer.nexmo.com/voice/voice-api/guides/text-to-speech#voice-names
